Appearance

pocket-vueA petite-vue fork with plugins support.

Optimized for progressive enhancement, it's a tiny (~9kb) yet powerful tool for sprinkling reactivity on existing HTML pages.

Getting Started
View on GitHub

Vue-Compatible Syntax

Use the same template syntax and reactivity model you know and love from Vue.

DOM-Based & Mutates In-Place

No virtual DOM. It's designed to be efficient by directly manipulating the DOM.

Tiny Footprint

Only ~9kb, making it perfect for projects where performance is critical.
